XPerl_AssistsView_Close()
this.SetButtonTex = function() local tex = XPerlAssistPin:GetNormalTexture() if (XPerlConfigHelper.AssistPinned) then tex:SetTexCoord(0.5, 0.96875, 0, 0.453125) else tex:SetTexCoord(0, 0.46875, 0, 0.453125) end
tex = XPerlAssistPin:GetPushedTexture() if (XPerlConfigHelper.AssistPinned) then if (XPerl_Assists_Frame.corner) then XPerl_Assists_Frame.corner:Hide() end tex:SetTexCoord(0.5, 0.96875, 0.5, 0.953125) else if (XPerl_Assists_Frame.corner) then XPerl_Assists_Frame.corner:Show() end tex:SetTexCoord(0, 0.46875, 0.5, 0.953125) end end this.tooltipText = XPERL_BUTTON_HELPER_PIN
XPerlConfigHelper.AssistPinned = not XPerlConfigHelper.AssistPinned this:SetButtonTex()
XPerl_Assists_MouseDown(XPerl_Assists_Frame, button, "targetFrame")
XPerl_Assists_MouseUp(XPerl_Assists_Frame, button, "targetFrame")
XPerl_Tutorial(11)
XPerl_Target_Assists_ScrollChild_Targetting:SetWidth(XPerl_Target_Targetting_ScrollFrame:GetWidth() / XPerl_Target_Targetting_ScrollFrame:GetEffectiveScale())
XPerl_Target_Assists_ScrollChild_Assists:SetWidth(XPerl_Target_Assists_ScrollFrame:GetWidth() / XPerl_Target_Assists_ScrollFrame:GetEffectiveScale())

XPerl_Tutorial(11)
XPerl_Assists_OnLoad(self)
this:SetScript("OnUpdate", XPerl_Assists_OnUpdate)
-- These two frames add to X-Perl UnitFrames. If X-Perl not loaded, then WoW will just ignore these without error
if (XPerl_RegisterUnitText) then XPerl_RegisterUnitText(self) end
XPerl_ToggleAssistsFrame("targetting") XPerl_SetFrameSides() XPerl_ShowAssists()
local title if (table.getn(XPerl_Assists_Frame.targetting) > 0 and XPerl_Assists_Frame.targetting[1][2] == "") then title = XPERL_TOOLTIP_ENEMYONME else if (XPerlConfigHelper.TargetCountersSelf == 0) then title = XPERL_TOOLTIP_ALLONME else title = XPERL_TOOLTIP_HEALERS end end
local t = XPerl_MakeAssistsString(XPerl_Assists_Frame.targetting, title) t = "|c00FFFFFF"..t.."\r|c009F6000"..XPERL_TOOLTIP_HELP GameTooltip:SetOwner(this, "ANCHOR_BOTTOMRIGHT") GameTooltip:SetText(t) GameTooltip:Show()
XPerl_PlayerTipHide()
if (XPerl_RegisterUnitText) then XPerl_RegisterUnitText(self) end
XPerl_ToggleAssistsFrame("assists") XPerl_SetFrameSides() XPerl_ShowAssists()
local t = XPerl_MakeAssistsString(XPerl_Assists_Frame.assists, XPERL_TOOLTIP_ASSISTING) t = "|c00FFFFFF"..t.."\r|c009F6000"..XPERL_TOOLTIP_HELP GameTooltip:SetOwner(this, "ANCHOR_BOTTOMRIGHT") GameTooltip:SetText(t) GameTooltip:Show()
XPerl_PlayerTipHide()
self:RegisterForDrag("LeftButton")
XPerl_AggroAnchor:StopMovingOrSizing() if (XPerl_Aggro) then XPerl_Aggro:SetScript("OnUpdate", XPerl_RefreshAggro) XPerl_AggroPlayer:Hide() XPerl_AggroPet:Hide() XPerl_Aggro:Hide() end
GameTooltip:SetOwner(self, "ANCHOR_CURSOR") GameTooltip:SetText(XPERL_AGGRO_DRAGTIP, 1, 1, 1)
GameTooltip:Hide()
XPerl_AggroAnchor:SetFrameStrata("DIALOG") GameTooltip:Hide() self.tex:Hide() XPerl_AggroPlayer:SetVertexColor(0, 0, 1) XPerl_AggroPet:SetVertexColor(0, 0, 1) XPerl_AggroPlayer:SetAlpha(1) XPerl_AggroPet:SetAlpha(1) XPerl_AggroPlayer:Show() XPerl_AggroPet:Show() XPerl_Aggro:SetScript("OnUpdate", nil) XPerl_Aggro:Show() XPerl_AggroAnchor:StartMoving()
XPerl_AggroAnchor:SetFrameStrata("MEDIUM") self.tex:Show() XPerl_Aggro:SetScript("OnUpdate", XPerl_RefreshAggro) XPerl_AggroAnchor:StopMovingOrSizing()
XPerl_AggroPlayer:Hide() XPerl_AggroPet:Hide() XPerl_Aggro:Hide()
if (XPerl_SavePosition) then XPerl_SavePosition(XPerl_AggroAnchor) end
XPerl_SetChildMembers(self)
self.Enable = function(self) self.Arrows:Show() self:EnableMouse(true) self:SetFrameStrata("MEDIUM") end self.Disable = function(self) self.Arrows:Hide() self:EnableMouse(false) self:SetFrameStrata("HIGH") end
self:Disable()
self:SetScript("OnUpdate", XPerl_RefreshAggro) if (GetLocale() == "koKR") then XPerl_AggroPlayer:SetFont("Fonts/K_Damage.TTF", 42, "THICKOUTLINE") XPerl_AggroPet:SetFont("Fonts/K_Damage.TTF", 16, "THICKOUTLINE") elseif (GetLocale() == "zhTW") then XPerl_AggroPlayer:SetFont("Fonts/bKAI00M.TTF", 42, "THICKOUTLINE") XPerl_AggroPet:SetFont("Fonts/bKAI00M.TTF", 16, "THICKOUTLINE") elseif (GetLocale() == "zhCN") then XPerl_AggroPlayer:SetFont("Fonts/ZYHei.ttf", 42, "THICKOUTLINE") XPerl_AggroPet:SetFont("Fonts/ZYHei.ttf", 16, "THICKOUTLINE") end
self.playerFadeStart = nil self.petFadeStart = nil
